item.title: Markup languages, templating & SSG's
item.description: In this session we cover the basics of markup languages, how to get data into our HTML and static site generators to create sites that are easier to maintain

item.title: Javascript, and Vendoring (Using other people's code)
item.description: This session will cover how to use existing code effectively, and legally. As well as some more advanced Javascript techniques

item.title: Bootstrap & intro Javascript
item.description: This session will cover using advanced CSS to design sites, and continuing to use CSS frameworks (specifically bootstrap) as well as introducing javascript!

item.title: Advanced CSS, and frameworks
item.description: This session will cover using advanced CSS, and CSS frameworks!

item.title: HTML, CSS, basic design
item.description: This session will help cover the basics of how webpages work, building basic pages, and a bit about design!

item.title: Introduction to Schulich Ignite
item.description: This session is here to have everyone setup their development environments and get introduced to the course!
